# ContractDeployer.deployNFTDrop property

Deploys a new NFTDrop contract

## Example

```javascript
const contractAddress = await sdk.deployer.deployNFTDrop({
  name: "My Drop",
  primary_sale_recipient: "your-address",
});
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
deployNFTDrop: {
        (metadata: NFTContractDeployMetadata): Promise<string>;
        prepare: (metadata: NFTContractDeployMetadata) => Promise<DeployTransaction>;
    };
```

## Remarks

Deploys an NFT Drop contract and returns the address of the deployed contract
